mapper.select: select IMG_ID, IMG_TYPE, IMG_PATH, IMG_NAME, NOTE, INS_DATE, INS_USER, UPD_DATE, UPD_USER from IMAGE
select IMG_ID, IMG_TYPE, IMG_PATH, IMG_NAME, NOTE, INS_DATE, INS_USER, UPD_DATE, UPD_USER from IMAGE where IMG_ID = #{imgId}
mapper.insert: insert into IMAGE (IMG_ID, IMG_TYPE, IMG_PATH, IMG_NAME, NOTE, INS_DATE, INS_USER, UPD_DATE, UPD_USER) values (#{imgId}, #{imgType}, #{imgPath}, #{imgName}, #{note}, #{insDate}, #{insUser}, #{updDate}, #{updUser})
mapper.update: update IMAGE set IMG_ID = #{imgId}, IMG_TYPE = #{imgType}, IMG_PATH = #{imgPath}, IMG_NAME = #{imgName}, NOTE = #{note}, INS_DATE = #{insDate}, INS_USER = #{insUser}, UPD_DATE = #{updDate}, UPD_USER = #{updUser} where IMG_ID = #{imgId}
